title: Banning reasons
body: So... calling someone an idiot doesn't ban people and having a bad day, accidentally and not purposefully dying is bannable? that's so cool. Riot Games, if you're gonna ban people who verbal abuses other people, like one of the topics in the reporting section, ban the people who actually call others stupid, idiot, moron, and etc,. I don't understand.

replies.body:
> So... calling someone an idiot doesn't ban people

It does. But calling someone an idiot in a single game wont get you punished. The system targets consistency, not just one-off comments.

> and having a bad day, accidentally and not purposefully dying is bannable?

It's not. **Intentionally** feeding is punishable. Feeding in general isn't.

If you got falsely punished for inting, submit a ticket to support. They will take an extra look at the game to see whether or not you were indeed just having a bad game.
The reverse, typically. logs or gtfo.

> ban the people who actually call others stupid, idiot, moron, and etc

Like... Have you actually read any of this board? Happens all the time.
